channel.title: What would happen if you tried to hit a baseball pitched at 90% the speed of light?
channel.description:
I thought this was pretty educational and funny as shit.
[url='https://what-if.xkcd.com/1/']https://what-if.xkcd.com/1/[/url]

item.title: What would happen if you tried to hit a baseball pitched at 90% the speed of light?
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
holy shit I guessed it almost entirely

I didn’t think about the plasma ball, but the mushroom cloud explosion part is obvious

item.title: What would happen if you tried to hit a baseball pitched at 90% the speed of light?
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
I found most of it very interesting and educational, but not necessarily all that funny…until I got to the end where it said, [COLOR=‘Black’]“A careful reading of official Major League Baseball Rule 6.08(b) suggests that in this situation, the batter would be considered “hit by pitch”, and would be eligible to advance to first base.” I chuckled.

Read full topic
